alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:04PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Lee, central Chesterfield and northeastern Kershaw Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 903 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge to near Westville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cassatt, Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, Mcbee, Society Hill, Patrick, Bethune, North Central High School, Cheraw Fish Hatchery, Alligator Fire Station, Middendorf, Bay Springs Fire Station and Ashland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
